Posts.Content: Jun 19, 2012 08:57PM Cher56 wrote: Hi.. not sure where to post this. but.. will try here. had BMX, sentinal nodes (4 i think), have had fever since day after, high white count, went to ER on Sunday as fever & pâin was still active. figured my lungs are trying to create infection. but even then, I didn`t mention my underarms, as I figured of course there would be swelling & pain. still have temp. on antibiotics..something is making me very nauseated, could be pain meds (used to them), or antibiotics, take them before, or ?? should I air on the side of caution & go see family doc? surgeon unavailable til Monday. also, straight across my drain sites, so so red & painful. ER dr said that was ok though. thanks
Posts.Title: Armpit swollen all of a sudden with pain and now have fever crazypenguinsfan Cher56
